name: Manifesting ‚ÄúHumanity 2.0‚Äù üîÆ (in the most inclusive and effective way possible)
description:
Join the group building the Humanity 2.0 Institute, which is working to provide individuals and organizations (Fortune 500, global rules makers, startups, etc) with the insights they need to flourish and move us closer to a world of universal human flourishing.


- - -

We will be asking for your input on:

  • 1) How do we create inspire and align humanity to accelerate human flourishing, in a way that ensures that people everywhere around the world are empowered and supported in doing so?
  • 2) How can we make sure a framework for human flourishing incorporates the best existing framework and insights from around the world?

- - -

ABOUT HUMANITY 2.0:

Humanity 2.0 is an organization whose mission is to generate foundational insights and tools that inspire and align humanity to accelerate human flourishing. One of its first priorities is to create a comprehensive human flourishing framework in partnership with leaders from Harvard, Oxford, UPenn, the Vatican's Pontifical Academy of Sciences, and more.
